ns4:Method.description: Executes the specified DCQL query, blocking until completion.
ns4:Method.name: execute

ns4:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns4:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns4:Method.description: Executes the given DCQL query and returns the results as standard data service results.
ns4:Method.name: executeAndAggregateResults

ns4:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns4:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns4:Method.description: Executes the specified DCQL query, and returns a reference to the query result resource.
ns4:Method.name: executeAsynchronously

ns4:Method.description: Performs the DCQL Query and created a FederatedQueryResults resource using the specified parameters.
ns4:Method.name: query

ns4:Input.description: An optional reference to a delegated credential. If not null, the FQP service will use the credential when contacting data services in the DCQL query
ns4:Input.name: delegatedCredentialReference

ns4:Input.description: An optional set of preferences specifying error handling and other preferences
ns4:Input.name: queryExecutionParameters

ns4:Method.description: Executes a DCQL 2 query and returns the results, blocking until the query completes
ns4:Method.name: executeQuery

ns4:Output.description: The results of executing the DCQL 2 query

ns4:Exception.description: Thrown when a problem arises executing the DCQL 2 query
ns4:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns4:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns4:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns4:Method.description: Executes a DCQL 2 query and aggregates the results as CQL 2 query results
ns4:Method.name: executeQueryAndAggregate

ns4:Output.description: The aggregated DCQL 2 query results as CQL 2 results

ns4:Exception.description: Thrown when a problem arrises executing the DCQL 2 query
ns4:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns4:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns4:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns4:Method.description: Performs the DCQL 2 query and creates a FederatedQueryResultsRetrieval resource using the specified parameters.
ns4:Method.name: queryAsynchronously

ns4:Input.description: The DCQL 2 query to be executed
ns4:Input.name: query

ns4:Input.description: An optional reference to a delegated credential. If not null, the FQP service will use the credential when contacting data services in the DCQL 2 query
ns4:Input.name: delegatedCredentialReference

ns4:Input.description: An optional set of preferences specifying error handling and other preferences
ns4:Input.name: queryExecutionParameters

ns4:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns4:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns4:Exception.description: Thrown when a problem arises executing the DCQL 2 query
ns4:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns3:Service.name: CaGridEnumeration
ns3:Service.ns3:description: The caGrid Federated Query Processor provides a mechanism to perform basic distributed aggregations and joins of queries over multiple data services.

ns57:Method.description: Returns the results of the query managed by this resource
ns57:Method.name: getResults

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates the query has not yet completed.
ns57:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns57:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns57:Method.description: Indicates whether or not the query processing is complete; until this is true, any results retrieval methods will fail.
ns57:Method.name: isProcessingComplete

ns57:Method.description: Gets the results of the DCQL query aggregated as a single CQL query result.
ns57:Method.name: getAggregateResults

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns57:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates the query has not yet completed.
ns57:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns57:Method.description: Creates a WS-Enumeration resource for retrieving the query results and returns a reference to them.
ns57:Method.name: enumerate

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns57:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates the query has not yet completed.
ns57:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns57:Method.description: Creates a caGrid Transfer resource for retrieving the results and returns a reference to them.
ns57:Method.name: transfer

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns57:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns57:Exception.description: Indicates the query has not yet completed.
ns57:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns57:Method.description: Gets the current federated query execution status.
ns57:Method.name: getExecutionStatus

ns86:ResourceProperty.description: The current time as believed by this service; should be consulted before setting a termnination time (standard ws-lifetime property).
The scheduled termination time of this resource (standard ws-lifetime property)
The current status of Federated Query execution. May be subscribed to via ws-notification for updates.

ns3:Service.name: FederatedQueryResultsRetrieval

ns90:Method.description: Returns a flag indicating if Federated Query Processing is complete; Until this operation returns true, all results retrieval methods will fail.
ns90:Method.name: isProcessingComplete

ns90:Method.description: Gets the current status of Federated Query Processing
ns90:Method.name: getExecutionStatus

ns90:Method.description: Gets the results of the DCQL 2 query aggregated as a single CQL 2 query result.
ns90:Method.name: getAggregateResults

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns90:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates Federated Query Processing is not yet complete
ns90:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns90:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns90:Method.description: Gets the results of executing the DCQL 2 query.
ns90:Method.name: getResults

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns90:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates Federated Query Processing is not yet complete
ns90:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns90:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns90:Method.description: Creates a WS-Enumeration resource for retrieving the query results and returns a reference to them.
ns90:Method.name: enumerate

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns90:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates Federated Query Processing is not yet complete
ns90:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns90:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns90:Method.description: Creates a caGrid Transfer resource for retrieving the results and returns a reference to them.
ns90:Method.name: transfer

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns90:Exception.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates Federated Query Processing is not yet complete
ns90:Exception.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns90:Exception.description: Indicates a problem internal to the Federated Query Processor
ns90:Exception.name: InternalErrorFault

ns3:Service.ns3:description: The resource-qualified DCQL 2 results retrieval service

ns124:Property.description: Length of time in minutes a Federated Query Results Resource will live
Number of worker threads for federated query processing execution
Maximum number of retries a client may request the FQP service perform when querying failing target data services
Maximum number of seconds a client can request for a timeout between retries when FQP queries a target data service and fails.
Maximum number of data services which can be targeted by a single DCQL query
